news.title: Paul Doyle appears in court over Liverpool parade crash
news.summary: The 53-year-old faces seven charges, two involving children after the crash on Monday night

news.title: Russell Brand pleads not guilty to rape and assault
news.summary: The broadcaster appears at a plea hearing after being accused of five charges relating to four women.

news.title: New Banksy mystery location revealed
news.summary: The new piece of street art depicts the shadow of a lighthouse emerging out of a bollard.

news.title: Jeremy Clarkson's new sidekick: 'I wear make-up but it doesn't mean I can't be a farmer'
news.summary: Harriet Cowan says she wants to represent young female farmers and champion mental health.

news.title: Ryanair boss on target for bonus worth more than €100m
news.summary: Michael O’Leary is set to earn a bonus worth more than €100m (£84m) after clearing a key performance target.

news.title: Russian captain of ship in North Sea oil tanker crash denies manslaughter
news.summary: Vladimir Motin pleads not guilty to gross negligence manslaughter over crash on East Yorkshire coast.

news.title: Real Madrid pay Liverpool to sign Alexander-Arnold early
news.summary: Real Madrid agree a deal with Liverpool to sign England right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold.

news.title: Tiara belonging to first female MP to take seat expected to fetch £250,000
news.summary: The auction house says the Cartier turquoise and diamond tiara could sell for more than £250,000.

news.title: Gaza subjected to forced starvation, top UN official tells BBC
news.summary: Tom Fletcher, the under-secretary general of humanitarian affairs, says "we're seeing food set on the borders and not being allowed in".

news.title: Tariffs court fight threatens Trump's power to wield his favourite economic weapon
news.summary: Despite the legal mire, all signs point to this being a battle the Republican president won't give up easily.
